record.text: We have a big problem with getting my refunds...it was double charged by the Silencer hotel and wheretosleep.com...30 days back when I called customer support they told I will get my money back in 3 days...I called them again after 30 days after I got my credit card statement...the same story repeated (I need to narrate whole circumstances again, they verified with hotel, they dont keep any record of which agent spoke to me and any confirmation information), customer service told I will get it in 3 days..I will get the refund confirmation email in 15 mins to 24 Hrs... even after 7 days I didnt get any email...this is happened twice with customer call.
